hero.title: Your complete auto care solution
hero.subtitle: From routine maintenance to major repairs, we fix it all. ASE-certified technicians, state-of-the-art diagnostics, and honest service. Brakes, engines, transmissions, electrical - trust us with your vehicle.

about.title: Complete Auto Care
about.subtitle: Expert service you can trust
about.content: Complete Auto Care has been the trusted choice for auto repair since 2008. Our ASE-certified technicians use the latest diagnostic equipment to accurately diagnose and repair all makes and models. Honest estimates, quality parts, guaranteed work.

products.name: Brake Service
products.description: Complete brake service including pads, rotors if needed, and fluid flush. Safety inspection included. Most vehicles.

products.name: Engine Diagnostics
products.description: Complete diagnostic with professional scan tools. Identify check engine lights and performance issues. Expert analysis.

products.name: Transmission Service
products.description: Transmission fluid flush and filter replacement. Extend transmission life. Prevent costly repairs.

products.name: AC Repair & Recharge
products.description: AC system diagnosis, leak check, and refrigerant recharge. Stay cool all summer.

products.name: Timing Belt Replacement
products.description: Critical maintenance to prevent engine damage. Includes water pump if recommended. Most vehicles.

products.name: State Inspection & Emissions
products.description: Official state safety and emissions inspection. Pass or we'll tell you what's needed.

items.text: Honest shop! They diagnosed my transmission issue and saved me $2000 with a simple fix. Other shops wanted to replace it. Highly recommend!
items.author: David Thompson
items.title: Regular Customer

items.text: Fair prices, excellent work, and they explain everything clearly. My family has been using them for years. Best mechanic in town!
items.author: Maria Garcia
items.title: Long-Time Client

items.text: Fixed my check engine light issue quickly and for a fair price. No unnecessary upselling. These guys are honest and skilled. I'm a customer for life!
items.author: James Wilson
items.title: Satisfied Customer

members.name: Rick Martinez
members.title: Shop Owner & Master Technician
members.bio: ASE Master Technician with 25+ years experience. Opened Complete Auto Care to provide honest, expert service. Believes in treating every customer's car like his own.

steps.title: Schedule Appointment
steps.description: Call or book online. Describe your vehicle's symptoms

steps.title: Diagnosis
steps.description: Complete inspection and diagnostic. Clear explanation of findings

steps.title: Approval & Repair
steps.description: Approve estimate, then we complete quality repairs

steps.title: Test Drive & Warranty
